sentences.en: " In Central America,'says Whitcomb, " the banana spider is a welcome house guest.
sentences.cn: 惠特科姆说: “ 在中美洲, 疾行异足蛛是一种受欢迎的住宅宾客.

sentences.en: A green banana is not ripe enough to eat.
Banana, grape, apple, daisy which of these is the odd one out?
sentences.cn: 香蕉 、 葡萄 、 苹果 、 雏菊--这几样东西哪一样与众不同?

sentences.en: Cut out the banana oil ; flattery will get you nowhere!
sentences.cn: 别花言巧语了, 吹捧 是不会使你捞到好处的!

sentences.en: Cut the banana in half lengthways.
everyone's beginning to think I'm bananas.
He had a banana and a wedge-shaped cheese for lunch.
sentences.cn: 他中饭吃一根香蕉和一块楔形的奶酪。

sentences.en: He told me that the palm of banana hefted 5 pounds.
sentences.cn: 他说那把香蕉称重为5磅。

sentences.en: I would like to take a cup of tea and milk, poached eggs, and one croissant and banana muffi.
sentences.cn: 我要加奶红茶、煮鸡蛋、月牙面包、香蕉松饼各一份。
菲比烘烤她最拿手的香蕉饼.

sentences.en: The area is under banana cultivation.
The banana bears two crops every year.
The child was feeding the monkey with a banana.
sentences.cn: 那个孩子正在给猴子喂香蕉.

sentences.en: There are some banana trees on that island over there.
sentences.cn: 那边小岛上有几棵香蕉树.

sentences.en: These companies are determined to keep a stranglehold on the banana industry.
sentences.cn: 这些公司决心要垄断香蕉业。

sentences.en: This is the banana that I buy.
